document.full_text: ethnically divided bosnia is facing its most serious crisis since it was established as a state 15 years ago, its international envoy warned on monday, accusing serb officials of threatening its viability.
document.title: bosnia facing worst crisis in 15 years: envoy
lines_and_colors: ethnically divided bosnia is facing its most serious crisis since it was established as a state 15 years ago, its international envoy warned on monday, accusing serb officials of threatening its viability.
